text: Couldn't Get It Right is a 1976 song by British blues rock band Climax Blues Band and is from their eighth album Gold Plated. It peaked at number 10 in the UK, number 3 in USA, number 8 in Canada and Ireland, number 9 in South Africa and number 29 in New Zealand. It was used in the opening credits to Bob the Builder and in an episode of Fringe. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:Fun Lovin' Criminals songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Funk rock songs
title: Couldn't Get It Right
